name: Prototype_Pinba
description:
This is the first pinball hack 'n slash game ever (as far as I'm aware). This demo features 1 tutorial level and 1 unlockable bonus room showcasing some of the unique mechanics of this brand new genre. Because of the robust GMS2 physics engine, many more mechanics can be implemented to fit any theme the game takes on.

The vapor-wave aesthetic is a placeholder theme implemented because I am not an artist, I am an engineer and am much more proficient at designing systems than sprites and sounds. I would love to partner with artists, level designers, writers, or other creative teams to flesh out this project in the future. Don't hesitate to reach out.

NOTE: Game designed to run on Windows 10 or greater via a wired connection to a PS5 Dualsense controller. Apologies for the specificity.
